$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_PACKAGE_TYPE)
This app needs permission to access your Apple Music library in order to play music within the app.
This app needs permission to use Bluetooth in the background at all times to function properly.
This app needs permission to access your calendars in order to schedule events and reminders within the app.
This app needs permission to access your camera in order to take photos and videos within the app.
This app needs permission to access your contacts in order to display them within the app and allow you to interact with them.
This app needs permission to access your location at all times or when you are using it in order to provide location-based services.
This app needs permission to access your location when you are using it in order to provide location-based services.
This app needs permission to access your microphone in order to record audio within the app.
This app needs permission to access motion data (such as accelerometer and gyroscope data) in order to provide certain features within the app.
This app needs permission to access your photo library in order to display photos and videos within the app.
This app needs permission to access Siri in order to provide voice-activated functionality within the app.
This app needs permission to access speech recognition in order to provide voice-to-text functionality within the app.
SplashScreen
